title: A fort for the afflicted VVherin are ministred many notable & excellent remedies against the stormes of tribulation. Written chiefly for the comforte of Christes little flocke, which is the final number of the faithfull, by Iohn Knoxe.
author: Knox, John, ca. 1514-1572.
publicationStmtPublisher: At the three Cranes in the Vintree, by Thomas Dawson,
